page.title: 07Living In The Area 2
page.content: The population of the area has changed a great deal in recent times. Formally people who lived around here were either born and brought up here, or got a job here, lived here and raised their own families. Today only a relatively small number of the people fall into that group. New houses have been built and these have mostly been bought by people who have moved in from other areas. Some of the old farm cottages, farm houses and even chapels have been converted by, or bought by people from outside the area. Sadly, some of the younger people who were brought up here find house prices too high for them to buy a house and have had to move away.
